element-type.name: decorate
element-type.description: "Decorate" a JSF input field when validation fails or when required="true" is set.

element-type.name: validate
element-type.description: A non-visual control, validates a JSF input field against the bound property using Hibernate Validator.

element-type.name: validateAll
element-type.description: A non-visual control, validates all child JSF input fields against their bound properties using Hibernate Validator.

element-type.name: cache
element-type.description: Cache the rendered page fragment using JBoss Cache. Note that s:cache actually uses the instance of JBoss Cache managed by the built-in pojoCache component.

element-type.name: span
element-type.description: Render a HTML span.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have an unique id. Automatically created if omitted.

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If false, this component will not be rendered.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: Component binding.

element-type.name: div
element-type.description: Render a HTML div.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have an unique id. Automatically created if omitted.

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If false, this component will not be rendered.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: Component binding.

element-type.name: link
element-type.description: A link that supports invocation of an action with control over conversation propagation. Does not submit the form.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have an unique id. Automatically created if omitted.

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If false, this component will not be rendered.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: Component binding.

attribute-type.name: styleClass
attribute-type.description: Corresponds to the HTML class attribute.

element-type.name: button
element-type.description: A button that supports invocation of an action with control over conversation propagation. Does not submit the form.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have an unique id. Automatically created if omitted.

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If false, this component will not be rendered.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: Component binding.

attribute-type.name: styleClass
attribute-type.description: Corresponds to the HTML class attribute.

attribute-type.name: accesskey
attribute-type.description: HTML: Sets the access key for this element.

attribute-type.name: alt
attribute-type.description: HTML: Specifies alternative text that can be used by a browser that can't show this element.

attribute-type.name: onblur
attribute-type.description: HTML: Specifies a script to be invoked when the element loses focus.

attribute-type.name: onfocus
attribute-type.description: HTML: Specifies a script to be invoked when the element receives focus.

attribute-type.name: onselect
attribute-type.description: HTML: Specifies a script to be invoked when the element is selected.

attribute-type.name: onchange
attribute-type.description: HTML: Specifies a script to be invoked when the element is modified.

attribute-type.name: tabindex
attribute-type.description: HTML: Specifies the position of this element within the tab order of the document.

attribute-type.name: type
attribute-type.description: HTML: A hint to the user agent about the content type of the linked resource.

attribute-type.name: size
attribute-type.description: The initial width of this control.

attribute-type.name: image
attribute-type.description: HTML: The URL of an image that renders in place of the button.

element-type.name: message
element-type.description: "Decorate" a JSF input field with the validation error message.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have an unique id. Automatically created if omitted.

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If false, this component will not be rendered.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: Component binding.

attribute-type.name: showSummary
attribute-type.description: Indicates whether the summary of the associated message(s) should be displayed. Default is: true

attribute-type.name: showDetail
attribute-type.description: Indicates whether the detail of the associated message(s) should be displayed. Default is: false

attribute-type.name: styleClass
attribute-type.description: Corresponds to the HTML class attribute.

attribute-type.name: infoClass
attribute-type.description: CSS class to be used for messages with severity "INFO".

attribute-type.name: infoStyle
attribute-type.description: CSS style to be used for messages with severity "INFO".

attribute-type.name: warnClass
attribute-type.description: CSS class to be used for messages with severity "WARN".

attribute-type.name: warnStyle
attribute-type.description: CSS style to be used for messages with severity "WARN".

attribute-type.name: errorClass
attribute-type.description: CSS class to be used for messages with severity "ERROR".

attribute-type.name: errorStyle
attribute-type.description: CSS style to be used for messages with severity "ERROR".

attribute-type.name: fatalClass
attribute-type.description: CSS class to be used for messages with severity "FATAL".

attribute-type.name: fatalStyle
attribute-type.description: CSS style to be used for messages with severity "FATAL".

attribute-type.name: tooltip
attribute-type.description: If true, the message summary will be rendered as a tooltip (i.e. HTML title attribute).

element-type.name: selectDate
element-type.description: Displays a dynamic date picker component that selects a date for the specified input field. The body of the selectDate element should contain HTML elements, such as text or an image, that prompt the user to click to display the date picker. The date picker must be styled using CSS. An example CSS file can be found in the Seam booking demo as date.css, or can be generated using seam-gen. The CSS styles used to control the appearance of the date picker are also described below.

attribute-type.name: for
attribute-type.description: the field identifier of the input item to pick a date for

element-type.name: convertDateTime
element-type.description: Perform date or time conversions in the Seam timezone.

attribute-type.name: dateStyle
attribute-type.description: default|short|medium|long|full

attribute-type.name: locale
attribute-type.description: locale

attribute-type.name: pattern
attribute-type.description: Custom formatting pattern

attribute-type.name: timeStyle
attribute-type.description: default|short|medium|long|full

attribute-type.name: timeZone
attribute-type.description: timeZone

attribute-type.name: type
attribute-type.description: date|time|both

element-type.name: convertEnum
element-type.description: Assigns an enum converter to the current component. This is primarily useful for radio button and dropdown controls.

element-type.name: enumItem
element-type.description: Creates a SelectItem from an enum value.

attribute-type.name: enumValue
attribute-type.description: the enum string value

attribute-type.name: label
attribute-type.description: the select item label

element-type.name: fileUpload
element-type.description: Renders a file upload control

attribute-type.name: data
attribute-type.description: value binding for the file data

attribute-type.name: fileName
attribute-type.description: value binding for the file name

attribute-type.name: fileSize
attribute-type.description: value binding for the file name

attribute-type.name: contentType
attribute-type.description: value binding for the file content type

attribute-type.name: accept
attribute-type.description: acceptable content types for the file

element-type.name: selectItems
element-type.description: Creates a List SelectItem from a List, Set, DataModel or Array.

attribute-type.name: disabled
attribute-type.description: if true the SelectItem will be rendered disabled. Can reference the var variable

element-type.name: fragment
element-type.description: A non-rendering component useful for enabling/disabling rendering of it's children.

element-type.name: conversationPropagation
element-type.description: Customize the conversation propagation for a command link or button (or similar JSF control). Facelets only.

element-type.name: conversationId
element-type.description: Add the conversation id to an output link (or similar JSF control). Facelets only.

element-type.name: convertEntity
element-type.description: Assigns an entity converter to the current component. This is primarily useful for radio button and dropdown controls. The converter works with any entity which has an @Id annotation - either simple or composite. If your Managed Persistence Context isn't called entityManager, then you need to set it in components.xml. Facelets only.

element-type.name: formattedText
element-type.description: Outputs Seam Text, a rich text markup useful for blogs, wikis and other applications that might use rich text. See the Seam Text chapter for full usage.

element-type.name: graphicImage
element-type.description: An extended h:graphicImage that allows the image to be created in a Seam Component; further transforms can be applied to the image. Facelets only.

element-type.name: taskId
element-type.description: Add the task id to an output link (or similar JSF control), when the task is available via #{task}. Facelets only.
